name: CCCC(K)C
description:
Made in three days using the wade game engine for Mini Jam 66 with the theme sweets and limitation only 2-buttons.

Chocolate Chip Cookie C(K)ills Candy is an endless game where you need to shoot the candy, survive, and collect coins to get a high score and unlock new skins.

Controls:

Use left and right to rotate 

You shoot on a timer and move forward automatically

Press left+right to stop

(I think theres a bug but it might be my bad computer)
